cards.rules_text: When Upholder of Ancient Oath enters, it seeks secrets or valor. [i](Give it that Oath Aura. Fulfill secrets by attacking with it and two or more other creatures to draw a card. Fulfill valor by dealing combat damage to a player to create a 2/1 white Soldier token.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 1‎ White‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Prowess
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, up to one target artifact you control becomes an artifact creature with base power and toughness 4/4 for as long as Ingenious Mechsmith remains on the battlefield.
cards.notes: Slot 7‎ Blue‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Prowess
Whenever you cast your first noncreature spell during each of your turns, create a black Aura Curse enchantment token named Decay attached to target player. That token has enchant player and “at the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, they lose 1 life.”
cards.notes: Slot 13‎ Black‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
This spell can't be countered
Whenever an opponent casts a spell during a turn other than theirs, create a function token with “This spell deals 4 damage to each opponent.” [i](It's an enchantment. As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, sacrifice any number of Functions to add their effects to that spell.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 19‎ Red‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{3}, {T}, Choose a color: Add one mana of the chosen color for each differently named land you control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“It's easy to present something new, exciting. I offer the old and reliable.”[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 25‎ Green‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text: [i]Revolt[/i] — Destroy target creature if it's attacking, blocking or a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.
cards.notes: Slot 2‎ White‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Foretell {5}{U}{U} [i](During your turn, you may pay {2} and exile this card from your hand face down. Cast it on a later turn for its foretell cost.)[/i]
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. If this spell was foretold, you may put each of them into your hand instead.
cards.notes: Slot 8‎ Blue‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, exile any number of creature cards with total mana value 7 or less from your graveyard. 
For each card exiled with Rite of Myriad Shapes, create a token that's a copy of it, except it's a 3/2 colorless Horror creature.
cards.notes: Slot 14‎ Black‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of combat on your turn, up to one target creature gets +2/+1 and gains trample and haste until end of turn.
Warp {R} [i](You may cast this card from your hand for its warp cost. Exile this creature at the beginning of the next end step, then you may cast it from exile on a later turn.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 20‎ Red‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Primal {2}{G} [i](During your turn, you may cast this spell for {2}{G} instead of playing a land.)[/i]
Return up to two target permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Overharvest.
cards.notes: Slot 26‎ Green‎ Uncommon‎ Noncreature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
When Laleh, Maharan Commander enters, if an opponent controls more lands than you, create a tapped colorless Plains Satrapy token.
Satrapies you control have exalted. [i](Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 3‎ White‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
Prowess
Each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard has reprise. Its reprise cost is equal to its mana cost minus {2}. [i](As you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may exile one card with reprise from your graveyard and pay its reprise cost. If you do, add its effects to that spell.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 10‎ Blue‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
When Undead Diva enters, conjure ten cards named Undead Servant and shuffle them into your library. [i](They're {3}{B} 3/2 Zombie creatures with “When Undead Servant enters, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each card named Undead Servant in your graveyard.”)[/i]
Other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have lifelink.
cards.notes: Slot 15‎ Black‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Skarvith Champion can only attack or block alone.
[i]Sabotage —[/i] Whenever an opponent or permanent an opponent controls becomes the target of a spell you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Skarvith Champion.
cards.notes: Slot 21‎ Red‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
Backup 1 [i](When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. If that's another creature, it gains the following abilities until end of turn.)[/i]
First strike, vigilance, lifelink
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
cards.notes: Slot 4‎ White‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
Flying, prowess
whenever Lysandra's Accomplice deals combat damage to a player, you may discard a card. If you do, search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value equal to its power, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
cards.notes: Slot 9‎ Blue‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
Delve [i](Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)[/i]
Menace
When Veil-Pierced Diabolist enters, target opponent chooses a card in your graveyard. Salvage it. [i](Exile it from your graveyard until this creature leaves the battlefield. Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, put a card it salvaged into your hand.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 16‎ Black‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
Flash
Haste
Whenever another nontoken creature you control with flash and/or haste enters, create a token that's a copy of that creature. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of your next end step.

cards.rules_text:
Vision [i](Whenever this or another creature you control enters, reveal the top card of your library. Then you may put that card into your graveyard.)[/i]
Whenever Reminiscent Waylighter envisions a creature card, you may put it into your hand.
{1}{G}, {T}: Put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.notes: Slot 28‎ Green‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Creature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
Each player can't cast spells during turns other than theirs.
[+1]: Create a 0/1 white Spirit creature token and an Idol token. [i](It's an artifact with “{1}, Sacrifice this artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Activate only as a sorcery.”)[/i]
[-1]: For each player, exile up to one target nonland permanent they control. While each one is exiled, its owner may pay {2} as a sorcery to put it onto the battlefield.

cards.rules_text:
When Bound by Possibility enters, aetherize up to X target creatures you control. [i](Create tokens that are copies of each of them, then exile them.)[/i]
Triggered abilities you control can't cause you to sacrifice or exile creature tokens you control.
cards.notes: Slot 11‎ Blue‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Noncreature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
This spell can't be countered.
[i]Augmented —[/i] Chromatic Impact deals damage to any target equal to the amount of mana spent to cast it. If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} to cast spells this turn, you may have it deal that much damage to each creature and each player instead.
cards.notes: Slot 23‎ Red‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Noncreature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
When Explorer's Potluck enters, create a food token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
You may play an additional land on each of your turns you have gained life.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Every meal tastes best after a long hard day.[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 29‎ Green‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Noncreature (MV 1-3)

cards.rules_text:
For each creature you control, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
Leitmotif [i](If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. When you next cast a spell that shares a color with this card, you may cast this from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 6‎ White‎ Rare or Mythic‎ Noncreature (MV 4+)

cards.rules_text:
Pressure {X}{U}{U} [i](You may cast this spell for its pressure cost if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.)[/i]
Gain control of target creature with mana value less than the amount of mana spent to cast Grip of the Watcher.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Some stories are not yours to tell.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Destroy all creatures. You lose 1 life for each creature destroyed this way.
Coalesce {5}{B}{B}{B} [i](You may cast this from your graveyard for {5}{B}{B}{B}. If you do, it enters as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)[/i]
Twist Fate's Hand's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

cards.rules_text:
{1}{R}{R}, Discard Akira, Wayward Sophomore: You may activate one of her loyalty abilities without paying its loyalty cost.
[+2]: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play up to two of those cards.
[+1]: Akira deals 4 damage to any nonplayer target.
[-2]: Create two 3/1 red Spirit creature tokens with trample and haste. Sacrifice those tokens at the beginning of your next end step.
cards.special_text:
{1}{R}{R}, Discard Akira, Wayward Sophomore: You may activate one of her loyalty abilities without paying its loyalty cost.

cards.rules_text: [i]Delirium[/i] — Mill six cards, then you may put a permanent card from among the milled cards onto the battlefield. If there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, you may put each permanent card from among the milled cards onto the battlefield instead.

cards.rules_text:
Colossal 4 — {5}{B}{R} [i](You may cast this for its colossal cost to have it enter with four +1/+1 counters; or pay {5}{B}{R} as a sorcery: Put four +1/+1 counters on it if it has none.)[/i]
Flying, haste
When Decadent Gorger enters or becomes colossal, return up to one target creature card with mana value less than or equal to Decadent Gorger's power from your graveyard to the battlefield.

cards.rules_text:
Choose one — 
• Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
• Each player sacrifices a creature.
• Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control, except it has haste. Sacrifice that token at the beginning of your next end step.

cards.rules_text:
Defender
Each embattled creature you control may attack as though it did not have defender, and may assign combat damage using its toughness rather than its power. [i](A creature is embattled if it has a counter on it or a permanent you control attached to it.)[/i]
cards.notes: Slot 35‎ Colorless‎ Uncommon‎ Creature (Any MV)

cards.rules_text:
When Mapwright's Prism enters, draw a card.

cards.rules_text:
Artifact harness [i](You may tap an artifact creature you control as you cast this spell. If you do, reduce this spell's mana cost by that creature's power.)[/i]
Multitude {12} [i](You may cast this spell for {12}. If you do, copy it.)[/i]
Other artifacts you control with mana value 7 or greater have protection from all colors.

cards.rules_text:

First strike, vigilance, trample, lifelink, haste.

cards.rules_text: Whenever a nontoken creature you own with mana value 2 or less is put into a graveyard from the battlefield for the first time each turn, exile it with two time counters on it. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. [i](At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, they may play it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant player
At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, they lose 1 life.

This spell can't be countered
Each noncreature spell that would cost less mana to cast than the greatest power among creatures you control costs that much mana to cast.
